text: Geng Tan (; born 1963) is a Canadian politician. He was a Member of Parliament (MP) as part of the Liberal Party between 2015 and 2019. He represents the riding of Don Valley North in Ontario. He is the first MP from Mainland China in the Parliament of Canada. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Ontario
title: Geng Tan
